citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a written and documented program for the environmental enrichment of the multiple species of
birds housed at the facility. Failure to develop a written environmental enhancement plan for birds can negatively impact
their health and well-being, causing unnecessary psychological distress. The licensee must develop, document, and
follow a species-appropriate plan for environmental enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of
birds. The plan must be in accordance with the currently accepted professional standards and must address all points in
section 3.154. Correct by February 12, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility does not have a written and documented program for the environmental enrichment of the multiple species of 
birds housed at the facility. Failure to develop a written environmental enhancement plan for birds can negatively impact 
their health and well-being, causing unnecessary psychological distress. The licensee must develop, document, and 
follow a species-appropriate plan for environmental enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of 
birds. The plan must be in accordance with the currently accepted professional standards and must address all points in 
section 3.154. Correct by February 12, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
